#include<stdio.h>
#define MAX 100010
#define IND 9594

int arr[MAX],prime[IND];
inline void sieve()
{
long long int i,j;
for(i=4;i<MAX;i+=2)
arr[i]=1;

for(i=3;i<MAX;i+=2)
for(j=i;j*i<MAX;j+=2)
arr[i*j]=1;

int k=1;
prime[k++]=2;
for(i=3;i<MAX;i+=2)
if(!arr[i])
prime[k++]=i;
//printf("%d",k);
}

inline int bins(int num)
{
int mid,low=1,high=IND-1;
while(low<=high)
{
mid=(high+low)/2;
if(num==prime[mid])
return mid;
if(num>prime[mid])
low=mid+1;
else
high=mid-1;
}
return -1;
}

int main()
{
    sieve();
    int tt,a,b,c,i,temp,x,y;
    scanf("%d",&tt);
    while(tt--)
    {
               scanf("%d%d%d",&a,&b,&c);
               x=-1;y=-1;
               temp=a;
               a=a<b?a:b;
               if(a!=temp)
               b=temp;
               
               for(i=a+1;x==-1;++i)
               x=bins(i); 
               for(i=b-1;y==-1;--i)
               y=bins(i);
             //  printf("%d %d",x,y);
             if(prime[x]>prime[y])
             printf("-1\n");
             else
             {
             c=c%(y-x+1);
             if(c==0)
             c=(y-x+1);  
             printf("%d\n",prime[x+c-1]);
}}
return 0;
}
